title: UFOs from the Kremlin - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/26/19
itunes:title: UFOs from the Kremlin - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/26/19
description:
George Noory and UFO researcher Nick Redfern recount how the Soviet Union created fake stories about flying saucers in America in the 1950s to create confusion, and how a prominent UFO eyewitness was accused by the FBI of promoting communism with his story of aliens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
